item.title: Denormalizing Tags
item.description: In our Tour of Extensions today’s article is about advanced tag indexing. We have a great data collection to play with and our goal today is to be able to quickly find data matching a complex set of tags. So, let’s find out those lastfm tracks that are tagged as blues and rhythm and blues, for instance. In this article, we’re going to play with music related tags
